item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v24.22 ETS2
item.description:
Sound Fixes Pack v24.22 ETS2

CHANGELOG v24.22
Engine sounds added to the 2009 Mercedes-Benz Actros (MP3 chassis, v6 engine) in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition] Compressor sounds can sometimes be heard now for the 2014 Mercedes-Benz Actros OM470 sound set in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition] – Special thanks to Max2712 for permission to use some of his sound samples in accordance to these Mercedes-Benz Actros trucks.

2009 Mercedes-Benz Actros (MP3 chassis, v6 engine) sound set is now the default sound set for truck_eu_4.soundref. [ETS2 edition] Horn sounds added to the 2007 DAF XF 105 in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition] 1 new interior suspension sound effect for significant bumps in the road at speed.
Added distinctive soybean loading sound for when soybeans are loaded into your trailer. [ATS edition]

Added entry for dynamic cargo loading sounds in the recommended audio settings information text file.

For your information: With ProMods Europe v2.70 you may encounter its own country specific railroad crossing bell sounds, in case you were wondering if it sounds different.

— Optional addon news —
Previous soundproofing for ATS updated with further soundproofing adjustments for the International LT.

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 8 years!

It packs a lot of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
* ETS2 1.50.2 + ATS 1.50.1. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
* Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
* Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
* Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.
* If hosting a Convoy dedicated server with this mod, it is recommended to turn on “mods_optioning” to prevent mod version restrictions.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods (unless proven to be compatible)

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

– An extensive variety of suspension and truck and trailer tire bump sounds.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements, including authentic sounds for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package, including tire noise for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech sound effects.
– Working sounds for the Musical Road in American Truck Simulator’s Historic Route 66.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds and a softer default reverse beep.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– Additional environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling and trailer brace rotation sounds.
– Four standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– The default wiper sound may now squeak only when the windshield is dry.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Lowboy Trailer Accessories Pack v1.50 ATS
item.description:
Lowboy Trailer Accessories Pack v1.50 ATS

Added the following information in the manifest:
mp_mod_optional: true
Small fix

This mod adds:
Bumpers with many slots
Markers with many slots
Various lights (brake light, turn signal light, position light, etc.)
Adds 3 general customization options (normal with slots, chrome with slots, and chromed steel with slots).



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Interior Soundproofing Effects Pack v1.50 ATS
item.description:
Interior Soundproofing Effects Pack v1.50 ATS

Interior soundproofing effects which each trucks have different soundproof effects can be seperated into 13 groups of soundproof effects:
Old Peterbilt
New Peterbilt
Old Kenworth
New Kenworth
Old Mack
New Mack
Old Freightliner/Western Star
New Freightliner/Western Star
Cabover Peterbilt
Cabover Kenworth
Cabover Freightliner
International
Unique trucks
Yeah that’s all, what do you expect



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Volvo NL12 EDC v1.4 ETS2
item.description:
Volvo NL12 EDC v1.4 ETS2

Changes 1.4
– Small adjustment to internal name
– Addition of optional tag
– Dummy change for the “platform” accessory
– Change in the interior modeling (to try to make it a little closer to the original, there will be more adjustments)
– Added doppler effect to the sound
– Re-texturing of the panel
– Fixed passenger position
– Ladder dummy rotation
– Changing the wiper button animation
– Added engine brake button animation
– Added trailer brake lever
– Reworked modeling and position of the stationary brake
– Corrected color of Volvo logo on steering wheel
– Added optional curtain

Volvo NL12 EDC
Engines: 360 HP, 360 HP “Chipado”, 410 HP and 410 HP “Chipado”
Chassis: 4×2, 6×2 and 6×4
Transmission: ZF 16 S165 (with original differential), ZF 16 S165 (with MB differential), ZF 12 TX 2420 (non- original) and ZF 16 AS 2630 (non- original)
Skin Template

Compatible with the 1.50x version
Standalone, available at Volvo dealer, used truck dealer and mod dealer



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DAF XF 105 Brazilian Style v1.0.2 ETS2
item.description:
DAF XF 105 Brazilian Style v1.0.2 ETS2

This mod adds a DAF XF 105, based on the game’s original model. But with a Brazilian style. It’s a standalone mod, it doesn’t interfere with the original game at all.

v1.0.2
– Fixed tank configuration. Where cable placements were not properly changed according to the tank configuration used.

Mod tested only on 1.50
It has an open pipe sound from Slav Jerry (he gave me permission to use the sound).



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
